product_name: Burton AK 2L Boom Shell Jacket - Men's
long_description: The lightweight Burton AK 2L Boom jacket features dependable Gore-Tex(R) waterproof technology that provides essential protection when you're searching for that perfect line down the mountain. Waterproof, breathable, windproof Gore-Tex(R) laminate provides an excellent defense against heat-robbing moisture and windchill. Fully taped seams with Gore-Tex tape create the ultimate seal against wind and snow. Breathable taffeta lining keeps warmth inside and wicks away moisture. Contoured hood is designed to fit the shape of your head, providing all-weather defense without impairing your vision or limiting your motion. Removable, water-resistant waist gaiter with jacket-to-pants interface creates a barrier against snow entry with compatible Burton pants (sold separately). Zippered hand pockets and a zippered chest pocket with water-resistant zippers give you plenty of storage space; jacket includes an internal goggles/media pocket. The Burton AK 2L Boom shell jacket has a performance-oriented articulated fit with a pattern designed to mimic the body's natural flex while riding and hiking.
